entry.title: Friday: Fog. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing early this afternoon. Fog dissipating near noon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h near noon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 24 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 6:07 AM CST Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind southeast 20 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 6:07 AM CST Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming southwest 20 near noon. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 6:07 AM CST Friday 31 March 2023
